snippet: At least five Los Angeles police officers are under investigation after a woman died during an arrest in which an officer kicked her genitals.
abstract: Los Angeles police officials say that at least five police officers are under investigation after Alesia Thomas died during a July 22 arrest in which an officer kicked her genitals when she resisted efforts to get her into a patrol car.
lead_paragraph: At least five Los Angeles police officers are under investigation after a woman died during an arrest in which an officer kicked her genitals.

headline.main: California: Inquiry Begins On Death After An Arrest
headline.print_headline: California: Inquiry Begins On Death After An Arrest
